data.text: @AM800News We all hate it but look hospital cases are down finally summer is coming every one will be outside we’re we be outside all the time just wait for fall to come I will be wearing a mask when needed when I be inside https://t.co/uKn4GvpCTL
@ToddWRoy1 @AM800News Ok. Have fun playing with your "straw man" 🤡🤡🤡🤡 https://t.co/Es2m80FtKp

@ToddWRoy1 @AM800News I see the meme but I have a question. Is this "straw man" representative of the covid fears you are trying to impose on everyone?

COVID paranoia is rampant, especially in the virtue signaling crowd.
@Tuna1314 @AM800News So you never went into a store in all this time? How about a dentist (yuck)? Doctor?

@AM800News What’s a mask? Is that those things people have been putting on their faces for the last two years? You know it was never required and you ever notice you can smell someone’s perfume or cologne through them….not sure how it would have stopped and air born aerosol 🤷‍♂️
